ygData.subject: PLEASE READ:  CONCERNING ADS
ygData.msgSnippet: OK first let me say I apologize for the ads at the top of the messages. Now a quick history lesson . . . Many moons ago I started this list on a service called
ygData.messageBody:
OK first let me say I apologize for the ads at the top of the
messages.
Now a quick history lesson . . .
Many moons ago I started this list on a service called onelist.
This service was swallowed by egroups.
This service was recently taken into the folds of Yahoo!
AHHHHH I can hear the groans already.


Last month I was sent this message (in breif)

-> eGroups is an advertiser supported service. We are able to
bring you this service, for free, because we sell banner ads on the
eGroups Web site, as well as either text or banner ads on group
messages (the text ads are discreet, 3-line blurbs inserted at the
bottom of the list messages).

For group owners who do not wish to have ads on messages in their
groups, we offer a "No Advertising Option." For $4.95 (US) per month
(payable in a single annual payment of $59.40), we will exclude ads
from the messages for your group <-

Now at the time I recieved this 3 page email I did not think it would
effect the mailing lists I own. But after reading some of the posts
to the list I have made the descision that if you want the ads gone I
will pay to have them removed. Please do not respond to the list
instead follow the link to the polls page and cast your vote,
http://www.egroups.com/polls/eqbards .

I won't act unless you want me to.

Toren Legendmaker
Gentleman Bard of Qeynos
Bristlebane
